sayings.text: Know thyself.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
Nothing in excess.
Excellence is a habit.
Character is destiny.
Do not impose on others what you do not want.
The highest goodness is like water.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Silence is a source of great strength.
He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior.
You are what your deep desire is.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
Let go, or be dragged.
Truth alone triumphs.
A good name is better than riches.
Do right while there is time.
A peaceful heart leads to a long life.
He who listens, learns.
Patience is the companion of wisdom.
Truth is the strongest shield.
Courage is fear mastered.
Honor binds where force cannot.
A steady mind conquers storms.
What is done in truth endures.
Raise your words, not your voice.
Yesterday I was clever; today I am wise, so I change myself.
What you seek is seeking you.
Let your life be your message.
Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
A man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Fall seven times, stand up eight.
Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
When the winds change, some build walls; others build windmills.
If you want peace, stop fighting with reality.
What you practice grows stronger.
A disciplined mind is your greatest ally.
Serve without attachment to outcome.
Where attention goes, energy flows.
What you do speaks so loudly I cannot hear what you say.
Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
Do the right thing. It will gratify some and astonish the rest.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
If it isn’t repeatable, it isn’t real.
He who has a why can bear almost any how.
What does not kill me makes me stronger.
Order is the shape of trust.
The limits of my language mean the limits of my world.
Precision is kindness to the future.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
To know is not enough; we must apply.
The heart has reasons that reason does not know.
Freedom is the right to do what the law permits.
Clarity turns effort into progress.
Vision without action is a daydream.
The bamboo that bends is stronger than the oak that resists.
One kind word can warm three winter months.
Small steps compound into destiny.
Fall down seven times, stand up eight.
Signals matter when they align.
Coherence is checkability under pressure.
You can’t scale what you can’t govern.
Truth travels best when it’s measurable.
Clarity is an exit from confusion.
Friction reveals the constraint.
The system is the product.
Reliability beats novelty at scale.
Measure first. Argue later.
Make it work, then make it right.
Standards create trust.
Transparency is governance.
Accountability is the price of power.
Alignment precedes stability.
A clear rule outlives a loud opinion.
The path is proven by walking.
Harmony requires boundaries.
Consistency is a form of strength.
A single thread can become a rope.
A clear mind makes a clear choice.
